## \_Array.min property

Find the smallest number in an array, if the array is empty the return is Infinity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static readonly min: typeof arrayMin;
```

## Remarks

See [arrayMin()](./rc-js-util.arraymin.md)<!-- -->.
